definitions: the quality of being fixed, fastened, or closed firmly

examples.text: the tightness of the seal was tested
the tightness of the knot
he increased the tightness of his hold

shortDefinitions: quality of being fixed, fastened, or closed firmly

examples.text: he managed to make himself comfortable on the chair despite the tightness of his trousers
you can vary the tightness of the knitting
the cook checked the ropes for tightness

definitions: a painful and constricted feeling in part of the body as a result of anxiety or illness

examples.text: he had an X-ray after complaining of tightness in his chest
the tightness in my throat returned
stretching will help prevent muscle tightness

shortDefinitions: painful and constricted feeling in part of body

definitions: (of a person's muscles or skin) the quality of being firm or taut

examples.text: she felt the tightness of his bicep
a good moisturizer would preserve his skin's tightness

definitions: the quality of being well structured or disciplined

examples.text: the tightness of the argument
the strength in this adaptation lies in the tightness of the script
a film founded on tightness of plot

shortDefinitions: quality of being well structured or disciplined

definitions: the state of having or allowing little room for maneuver

examples.text: the tightness of the space

shortDefinitions: state of having or allowing little room for manoeuvre

definitions: the state of changing direction sharply

examples.text: the tightness of the bends

definitions: the state of being limited or restricted

examples.text: we remain concerned about the tightness of resources
the tightness of my schedule kept me from playing tournaments
the extreme tightness in today's oil markets

shortDefinitions: state of being limited or restricted

definitions: the state of having a close relationship

examples.text: he speaks with greater impact because of his tightness with Washington

definitions: the quality of having only a small margin between winner and loser

examples.text: the tightness of the game was very evident

shortDefinitions: quality of having only small margin between winner and loser
